resources.string: Enable to draw more power when connected to a PC USB port (750mA)
Select to disable the capacitive button backlight
Select of powerfull haptic feedback or disable
Select SDCard Cache size for better speed r/w.
Theory of Operation and Tuning for Write-Heavy Loads
In hundredths of a second, this is how often pdflush wakes up to write data to disk
In hundredths of a second, how long data can be in the page cache before it\'s considered expired and must be written at the next opportunity
Maximum percentage of active that can be filled with dirty pages before pdflush begins to write them
Maximum percentage of total memory that can be filled with dirty pages before processes are forced to write dirty buffers themselves during their time slice instead of being allowed to do more writes
Controls the tendency of the kernel to reclaim the memory which is used for caching of directory and inode objects
